title: Moving charges - changing velocity and B-field

content.question: A charged particle moves with speed <math alttext="v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> into a magnetic field of strength <math alttext="B sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>B</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> directed into the page, as shown. The particle experiences a force <math alttext="F sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> due to the magnetic field. A second identical charged particle moves with a speed <math alttext="v sub 2 is greater than v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> into a second magnetic field of strength <math alttext="B sub 2 is greater than B sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>B</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>B</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> also directed into the page. The second particle experiences a force <math alttext="F sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> due to the new magnetic field. Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="F sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="F sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="F sub 1 is less than F sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="F sub 1 is greater than F sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="F sub 1 equals F sub 2, which equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="F sub 1 equals F sub 2, which is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="F sub 1 is less than F sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>
